DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , open-label , randomize , 2-period crossover study design determine relative bioavailability ipatasertib administer capsule tablet formulation healthy adult volunteer . Participants randomize one two treatment sequence receive single oral administration ipatasertib tablet capsule formulation follow , washout period , single oral administration ipatasertib second formulation . Pharmacokinetics assess , standard physical clinical evaluation perform throughout study . Time study expect 2 week .
